name: Swarm (itch) (arachnid56)
description:
Survive for as long as possible, before, inevitably, the swarm gets you.

Find orbs to keep your vision radius high, and use your blasting spell when the swarm is closing in on you.

Programming and graphics were done by me. Music was taken from https://opengameart.org/content/theme-of-the-masked-man-loopable-chiptune-slow-b...

Game is written in the Haxe language using the Heaps game engine.
